price: 61. Serán expulsados de la misericordia de Al-lah y serán capturados y ajusticiados dondequiera que se encuentren.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
